2014-12-21-one-pissed-parrot.title: One Pissed Parrot
2014-12-21-one-pissed-parrot.author: admin
2014-12-21-one-pissed-parrot.__content:
This is one pissed parrot. Why is he pissed? It might have something to do with those feathers there. It all started with a few quick sketches, before settling on this one. As you can see in the progress shots below, I started by adding local colours (the base colour of a material not in light or shadow), then shadows, highlights, bounce light, a secondary light source, texture, background and lastly, depth of field. Hope you like it! Make sure to follow me on Twitter and Instagram for more art updates :)
